About Us

About Us

We are a couple / associates / partners-in-crime, where she is the designer and he is the developer.

I consider myself a software craftman. I like to go deep into a problem, analyze all the possibilities, and come up with the simplest most elegant solution, which may well have nothing to do with software.

My favourite tools:

Python, Django, Javascript, React, SQL, Ansible, Docker, AWS, Linux.

I’m a graphic designer by degree and sales woman by experience who’s worked in both non-profit and for profit corporations. I like to work with people and companies helping them articulate their story and educate their audience about why they should care.

My favourite tools:

Adobe Suite, Affinity Designer, Figma, HTML & CSS, my Bamboo.
